## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are completed before requesting review -->

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines (ruff format, ruff check, mypy)
- [ ] Self-review of code performed
- [ ] Code commented, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced (bandit)
- [ ] All tests pass locally (pytest)
- [ ] No sensitive information (secrets, keys, tokens) committed
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional commit format
- [ ] Branch is up to date with target branch
